atlas_tile.description: The shortname defined in the terrain_textures.json.

atlas_index.description: The index of the texture array inside the definition of that shortname.*

atlas_tile_variant.description: The variant of the block's texture array inside the shortname's block variation.

ticks_per_frame.description: How fast frames should be changed. 20 ticks = 1 second.

frames.description: List with numbers of frames which defines their order.

replicate.description: Sets the size of pixels. Default: 1.**

blend_frames.description: Defines should frames transition be smooth or not. Default: true.
